clinical_study.brief_title: Effects Of Consumption Of A Highly Mineralized Sodium Bicarbonated Water On Blood Lipid Profile
clinical_study.official_title: Effects Of Consumption Of A Highly Mineralized Sodium Bicarbonated Water On Blood Lipid Profile

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to assess the beneficial effect of the short term consumption of the highly mineralized bicarbonated sodium water on blood lipid parameters compared to a low mineralized water.
